samiboule i didnt know you cleared superfish
sami how insane is your japanese knowledge when youre playing ff6 in japanese?
oh i cleared fairydust this morning btw
u know i have the feeling like jrpg with lots of dialogue and not hard dont suit each other but okay
no narration so it's a lot less literary than like a VN or a book
is there a reason it has a 1.7 on delfruit
everyone who's good beats it in like 20-30 minutes
i cleared lime as fast as you, thats the only game where that will ever happen :)
it's such a shame that „É®„Éº„É®„Éº is like an absolute god of a maker but the only games people care about are Lime and Gel FeelsBadMan
some people care about salt and sugar
razor doing his requests is basically like those guys you email and then they never answer and 1 year later u get a random mail saying ye nah bro
at least it inspired a lot of (mid tight space dodge) attacks in avoidances
I will neither confirm or deny this max
max how would u define avoidance
I'm aware superfish is not as impressive
I'd say having to avoid projectiles for a certain amount of time
pattern avoidance is still avoidance, just not barrage
what about a screen of every attempt randomly reangled apple circle needle?
imo an avoidance is any boss you don't shoot
i consider C2 Biff an avoidance
there doesnt have to be a song tho
I don't think that having synced to the music is a necessity, plus this definition now requires a definition of the word boss
so would a needle screen where spikes come from the left be an avoidance
no because no timer i suppose?
if you just have to survive for a while to clear then I would say yes
i'd say a boss is any obstacle in which there are moving components involving reactions and movements not otherwise seen in platforming
usually proceeded and preceeded by a save point
yeah the thing is i fully believe melanzana-likes are closer to a needle game than an avoidance game
they share more with needle than avoidance
also idk what "movements not otherwise seen in platforming" means
are you telling me you don't react to patterns?
if you include patterns as reaction then I'm also reacting in needle
I get to a new jump and react to what I have to do next
you can react in needle whenever you want to
@Yiazmat7 melanzana, carbonic, that kind of really precise movement-based 100% pattern games
doing the jump now vs. doing the jump 5 minutes from now will be the exact same
even if you include timing based reactions
if you wait 5 minutes to dodge a pattern you're dead
look at a lot of gimmick needle
you have to chain vine jumps and whatever together
when you think about it, last tis phase 5 is just a randomly generated needle screen
besides carbonic isnt 100% pattern and there is barely any 100% pattern fights and the level of precision for most games are not on melanzana levels
and i feel like putting any kind of pattern avoidance on that level is very wrong
one day somebody will make an avoidance with a pattern level of melanzana and the rng level of mayumushi
and then blue will just flex and beat it in like sub 10 hours
don't get too full of yourself max :)
this is ultrafast rng reading, mayumushi is dense complex reading
no i mean i can tell it's different
that is fast but not as fast as this
if it's clear then what is the difference
what about mir clearing verre and melanzana but like no other avoidances
melanzana is 100% made for needle players
@grav7 guess we're gonna forget that the other clearers are avoidance players lol
i never said mir is the only clearer LOL
have you done the big chungus in the bathroom challenge
what sami is saying that everyone else who cleared melanzana is an avoidance player rather than a needle player
not that mir is the only clearer
my point is solely that saying that melanzana was made for needle players implies it was afailure
cuz like the only people who play it are avoidance players
i did not imply that what the fuck
i'm literally a needle player i love melanzanalikes
sami structure your sentences more simply
melanzana is only really played by avoidance players
so i think that saying it was made for needle players is a bit of a strong proposition
the thing is i didn't say avoidance players can't play it at any point
you said it was made for needle players
what i said is it's the perfect avoidance for needle players because the skillsets are very similar
zero isn't universally good either, gimmicks mess him up
Gl and to lurk i go
so unless you know what eruna was intending, that doesn't seem to fit with who's actually playing it
@grav7 i understand what you mean but still disagree
a bunch of people argue who the best needle player is
though it is a more reasonable assertion
even more the best avoidance player
WHO is the best gimmick player
you're strongly restricting what "avoidance skillset" means max
avoidance players tend to be good at remembering and figuring out how to do attacks
how do you feel about just using the word barrage for what you call avoidance
and needle players tend to be good at figuring out and getting consistent at precise movement
which is what melanzana is about
figuring out patterns is a part of melanzana
on top of that there's still reading involved in dodging pattern
i'm not completely disagreeing with you though
only barrages are true avoidances, pattern stuff is just needle in the form of cosplay-avoidance
i mean honestly if you start looking at edge cases like melanzana or cycle needle the barrier between what is needle and what is avoidance is really blurry
which is why i think it's more nuanced than what you're saying
ok i feel like we should start at what definitely isn't avoidance and work up from there
like, other than lol troll :tf: i think most people here agree that like
thought you would not like me saying so
even if it amounts to nothing
I mean we're not discussing them because this is actually an important issue to us
we're discussing it because it's conceptually an entertaining question
yeah i don't care about convincing anyone
i don't think anyone is being like super serious my life depends on this about it LOL
guy's who is your favorite ninja turtle
is this game that bad ? for having a 1.7/10 on delfruit shisRoscoe

i always hit it with some seasoning

they're usually kinda "yeah idk it kinda tastes like nothing"
rice in a wrap is like üíØ emoji though
like, if you wanna make a taco infinitely better
I like rice better than pasta
I don't feel that strongly about it though
it doeznt bode well by itself tho
pasta and rice are both fine
like if i'm having steak the perfect pair is always pasta
if I'm having steak I'm just eating steak
i would not have steak and pasta together honestly
I haven't had steak in like two years though
I've heard steak goes really well with numpad
atoned stakes go well wirh 2 left shifts
this post was made by two shift gang
i have never played with anything other than default controls
Shift Z Left Right R, maybe Up Down
i downloaded 2006 because i was interested in the platforming
if it was just the first stage it'd be a solid Gold pick
I use both numpad and left/right shfit but I prefer left/right shift more often than not
like, once the visuals go to black and white it's just a standard needle/avoidance
but the first stage would be baller for sudoku
i was gonna say no way holy fuck
do you think this boss would be easier or harder with fruit instead of spikes
I just had a thought: what if there were a hypothetical scenario where the life of another person depended on a series of precise and very easy to mess up actions like this
the spikes have different sizes, would the fruit get downscaled too?
it'd literally just be replacing the spike sprite with the fruit sprite
imagine if water irl behaved like water in fangames
like, how would you feel when performing that particular scenario?

but yeah like its really hard to understand what razzor is saying
you died so close to the end
and you have been playing only for 5 hours dude
we died at the same time max lmao

I personally like to think that there are two types of reading skill: "passive reading" which you can just do on instinct, and "active reading" which actually requires you to stay focused and react conciously
there is already a concept of conscious vs unconscious competence
I think it's not just autopilot, it's also a difference between looking at the screen as a whole and just kinda seeing where to go and having to explicitly look for a gap
those final second deaths are just so you get to enjoy the sourpls and banging avoidances more
you just did, said you took twice the amount of time after choking penger
how does one do a plane in the i wanna be the guy fangames
what is the possibility of me doing the ctb ex stage in gbc, in percentage
on second thought, there's quite the ledges in this, and i don't like like ledges
your headphones don't like when you scream, so they "no"
are there save blockers in the spinny kid stage
My stream is barely loading give me a moment
I made a fucking crazy map in IWM
I'm gonna try to verify it in a bit but I'm hungry
I wager this map will probably take me like 5 hours to verify lol
I'm scared of what I've done
I remember I wanted to play this boss, and I played through most of the platforming, but I got stuck somewhere
iirc I got stuck in this long room with gravity flippers that was fucking stupid
I wanted to beat that room because I had no idea what the fuck was going on
Err, rather, I couldn't BECAUSE I had no idea what the fuck was going on
You got this! I believe in you
I assume that went well lmao
I think Lime is an interesting boss, but it's definitely just bullshit
tbf tho Yoyo's other major avoidance is also just bullshit garbage to play
Something I've noticed about Yoyo is that he makes some very good adventure games, and the bosses in those games are usually fine, but his avoidances are fucking ass to play
Not all of his avoidances are bad
Like, Altale and Santipalt are good
but Gel and Lime are fucking garbage tbh
After the experience I had way back when with Z3 Gel I don't think I could ever consider a boss like Gel to be good
but it's fucking horrendously god awful
Honestly that's my main gripe with Gel, not really that it feels super bullshit to play
but the bouncing + curving in particular
I think bouncing + curving as a concept isn't bad, but it becomes immediately bad when the bouncing is fast
Fast bouncing in general is just strictly impossible to make fun
and I think that's what ruins Gel as a boss for me is that all the bouncing is hyper fast, and I just can't understand dealing with it
i just realized i hadn't heard him in a while and i got worried LOL
I've personally always hated bouncing attacks
I don't think I've encountered a single one that I genuinely liked
Like, bouncing by itself isn't necessarily awful
I dislike bouncing, but it by itself isn't the problem

The main 2 problems that come with bouncing are either A. It's way too fucking fast to be reactable, or B. It's used in garbage arenas like 5/4 where it's very easy for the bullets to clump up and become undodgeable
I hate bouncing, in every occurence I've encountered it it just feels impossible to get consistent at
gbstination bouncing is not a bad attack
I think the arena thing is a more prevalent issue, since most bouncing attacks in older games are present in 5/4, and they're really bullshit to dodge

it feels like you just stay near the corner and pray that a whole bunch of fruit don't sweep you up

corner seems like a really bad idea for random360 bouncing
like i'm no avoidance expert but i would certainly not do that

you would literally lose more money
